text:
Hi all,
I am working on an integration app for the HubSpot and I want to create my own custom workflow action but I am getting a 404 error resource not found.
So I want to ask you whether custom workflow action creation comes under the paid feature of HubSpot for the developer account.
Have Anyone an idea how to create custom workflow action for an integration app for the HubSpot.
No you can not add the setting button at the top of CRM card. It will be displayed at the bottom only.
anyone know how to trigger change() event on dependents form fields?
